Title: All Brawn, No Brains
Description:
Varsek is one of the toughest drakonids you'll ever meet. One of the dumbest ones too, but he'll never admit that.

He got spooked after Frostbite and started re-evaluating his life or... something. Said he never got to study the ruins left behind by his ancestors. Ran off to be a "scholar".

Get Varsek back here. He doesn't belong there anyhow!
ObjectivesText: Find Varsek in the Ancient Outlook.
RewardText: It's very nice to meet you, but as you can see, I'm a bit busy trying to solve this puzzle.
